hero-subtitle: Everything in one place, the best of modern technology!
about-text: Open source project that unifies various artificial intelligences in a single platform. The system uses a central AI that analyzes the user's specific task, identifies the best AI to execute it, and forwards the request. Then, it returns the final response in an integrated and efficient way.
about-text-2: The project's proposal is to bring more convenience by unifying various AIs in a single point, offering 100% free access. We provide browser extensions that facilitate daily use, as well as VS Code extensions, integrating the tool directly into your development environment.
find-out-more: Find out more about the project
contact-description: Hey! Developer, you're welcome to participate in the project.
projecto-bjective: Project created to simplify direct access to AIs, so that the end user has everything in one place in an easy and fast way.
